data.name: Welcome
data.value: 🎮 Welcome to Tamagotchi Bot! Here you can raise your own virtual pet, play with him and compete with another players 🎮 Let's start!

data.name: ChooseName
data.value: 🧸 First of all you need to name your new friend Just type it here

data.name: ConfirmedName
data.value:
🧃 Nice! Your pet is waiting for you 🐱 Do not forget feed and wash him, play a games and just love ☺️
BTW '/menu' shows some commands to start

data.name: petCommand
data.value:
🐱 {0} 💊 HP: {1}% 🍕 Satiety: {4}% 🛁 Hygiene: {9}% 😴 Fatigue: {5}% 🎊 Joy level: {7}%
💰 Gold: {8} 💴 ⚡️ Status: {6} 🏅 EXP: {2} | {3} level ✨
/gameroom - Play in Apple🍎 /reward - Get your daily reward 🎁

data.name: DevelopWarning
data.value: In developing, wait for next update 👾

data.name: ChangeLanguage
data.value: Choose new language: - Belarusian (беларуская) 🇨🇷 - Russian (русский) 🇷🇺 - English 🇺🇸 - Polish (Polski) 🇵🇱

data.name: gameroomCommand
data.value:
You are in the gameroom
⚽️ Fatigue: {0}% 🎊 Joy: {1}% 💰 Gold: {2}
🍏 Apple Game = +{3}🎊 | -{4}💰 🎲 Dice Game = +{5}🎊 | -{6}💰
Do not play so much and safety first! 🧗‍♀️

data.name: denyAccessSleeping
data.value: You can not come in: pet is sleeping 🌙

data.name: hospitalCommandHighHp
data.value: A healthy pet is the key to success 🏄🏄🏻‍♀️🏄 Good job, your pet is full of energy: {0}% ❤️‍🔥

data.name: hospitalCommandMidHp
data.value: Safety first 🏥 Do not forget feed your pet! 🤕 Health is middle level: {0}%

data.name: hospitalCommandLowHp
data.value: Jesus Christ! Your pet is one foot in the grave! ☠️ Help him now! 🚑 Health: {0}%

data.name: PetCuringAnwserCallback
data.value: Your pet has been cured on {0}% 🌡 But joy decreased on {1}%

data.name: helpCommand
data.value:
🌈 Welcome to the world of Tamagotchi! 🌈 Here, you can create your own virtual pet friend 🐩🐈🐈‍⬛🐕 Make sure to keep track of your pet's progress: ▫️ Play different games with them ⚽️ ▫️ Feed them delicious treats 🍕🍳🍫 ▫️ Take care of their needs 🍼 ▫️ Encourage them to exercise and show love 😻
In the command menu, you will find everything your pet needs 🌻. Be sure to visit your pet frequently because they also love you and will be thrilled to play with you 🤍❤️🤍

data.name: menuCommand
data.value:
What to do with pet: /pet - pet's status 🐱 /kitchen - feed your pet 🍕 /work - to earn more gold 💰 /reward - to earn daily bonus 🎁 /sleep - bedroom 🧸 /gameroom entertainments 🎳 /ranks - see the best pets! 👑 /hospital - cure your pet 🏥 /bathroom - clean your pet 🛁 /rename - to change name 🌀
There will be more in future! Stay tuned! 💝

data.name: FarewellText
data.value:
You have come to {0}, but all you see is an empty room and a note on the table: "My beloved friend {1}! It was very nice to spend time with you, but I've started feel not good. You should have kept an eye on me...😿"
Your pet left because he lacked care 💔

data.name: EpilogueText
data.value: It happens to everyone, but life goes on! Maybe you'll be lucky with a new pet 😼 Try again? 🫶

data.name: ReminderNotifyText1
data.value:
😺: You've come back! I've missed you so much! I want to eat 🌭 and play with you 🪁
/kitchen to feed 🍩 /gameroom for games 🏓

data.name: appleGameHelpText
data.value: The rules of the game are simple: the one who eats an unripe green apple will lose. You can choose to eat one 🍎, two 🍎🍎 or three 🍎🍎🍎 apples at a time Can you outplay your pet and leave him a tasteless 🍏?

data.name: appleGameUndefiendText
data.value: Choose one 🍎, two 🍎🍎 or three 🍎🍎🍎 apples to eat

data.name: appleGameLoseText
data.value:
Your green apple remains
🐱: Better luck next time 😉

data.name: tooTiredText
data.value: Your pet is too tired, he should sleep 💤

data.name: changelog1Text
data.value:
⚡️⚡️ New update 1.2 is out⚡️⚡️ Added: 🎠 You can resurrect a pet for 1000 gold (so collect coins, they will come in handy) 🚦Redesigned start for beginners
Corrections: 🩼 Improved bot stability 🛋 Lots of bugs fixed 🍫 You can now feed any food up to 100% satiety 🚚 You can now go to work only if the pet is rested (has less fatigue than required at work) 🎗 Hidden gags added :)
In the plans: 🤼‍♀️ Multiplayer - soon you can add a bot to chat with friends to play mini-games with other users 🐿 New types of pets 🎰 New mini games 🏫 Add school, education

data.name: ReminderNotifyText2
data.value:
🐱: Waiting for you here, come back
/kitchen to feed 🍩 /gameroom for games 🏓

data.name: ReminderNotifyText3
data.value:
🐱: Sadness to be alone...
/kitchen to feed 🍩 /gameroom for games 🏓

data.name: denyAccessWorking
data.value: You can not come in: pet is on work 💻

data.value:
Choose what your pet will be doing 💡
Programing 💻 -{0} minutes ⌛️, +{1} golds 💰

data.name: PetWorkingAnswerCallback
data.value: Gold +{1} 💰 The pet is tired at +{0}% 😓 Wait until the pet finishes work

data.name: tooManyStarvingCommand
data.value: Pet is good now. Enough to eat 🤢

data.name: rewardCommandDailyRewardGotten
data.value: You have already got your daily reward today 🫶🏻

data.name: rewardCommand
data.value: There's a daily reward waiting for you! 💸 Take it soon! 🎁

data.name: rewardNotification
data.value: 🎁 Come on for your daily bonus 🎉 /reward 🎁

data.name: RandomEventStomachache
data.value:
❤️‍🔥Help your pet urgently! 😾: my tummy hurts very much...
-5% health 💊 -15% satiety 🍕
/hospital - you have to run to the clinic!

data.name: RandomEventFriendMet
data.value:
Walking with a pet in the city, you met an old friend of Lionko🦁
+40% to joy 🎊 +15 gold 💰 (borrowed from a friend)
/pet - check pet's status

data.name: RandomEventHotdog
data.value:
🌭 You were asked to rate a new hot dog recipe 🧑‍🍳
+40 satiety🍕 +20 gold💰
/pet - check pet's status

data.name: RandomEventStepOnFoot
data.value:
🧑‍🌾Some passerby stepped on the pet's foot 🗣
👺-1% health 💊-10% joy🎊
/pet - check pet's status

data.name: RandomEventRainbow
data.value:
🌈 You saw the rainbow after the rain 🌦
+10% joy 🎊
/pet - check pet's status

data.name: bathroomCommand
data.value:
You're in the bathroom 🛁 🚿 Hygiene: {0}%
Remember to brush your teeth before going to bed🪥

data.name: RandomEventFireworks
data.value:
You went to watch the fireworks 🎇 But the pet accidentally stepped into a puddle 💦
+20% joy 🎊 -10% hygiene 🛁
/pet - check pet's status

data.name: PetCameBackText
data.value:
After a long search and a lot of money for detectives, the pet was found! 😺 You asked for forgiveness for a long time and promised not to forget about your pet again 🐣 You both reconciled 💕
/pet - check pet status

data.name: NotEnoughGoldToResurrect
data.value: Unfortunately, you don't have enough money ☠️

data.name: PetIsFullOfJoyText
data.value: The pet has already played enough ⛹️‍♀️
